comments.content: That looks like ITC Johnston [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/johnston/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802214445/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/johnston/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/johnston/") or P22 Underground [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802214445/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground/")
